resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer mattis elit quis orci scelerisque, id consequat lacus tempus. Sed ac pharetra turpis, ac tempus urna. In gravida dolor at eros interdum, ac ultrices tellus tempus. Donec non rutrum est.
Before you can using this application you must add your OpenAI Api key / Token. Your Api Key / Token is saved on your device.
Please add your API Key from [OpenAi](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys) first by clicking settings button on top of this page
By default this app is using gpt-3.5-turbo
